page.title: 13Local news
page.content: The local issues in our newspapers are things like{Navy news},because Portsmouth is near us.In our area there are lots of trees being cut down and buildings replacing them.An example of this is in{Locks Wood}where a shopping centre has been built.In the centre there is a shop for every shopper's need. In the newspapers lately there has been a lot about a man who got stuck down a well and all the bricks and things collapsed on him and when some men found him they found he was dead.This happened on the Isle Of Wight. We have done a{survey}of children in our school about what they would like in{newspapers}.Twenty-five people wanted more comics,forty-five people wanted more popstars, seventeen people wanted more stories and fifty- five people wanted more sport in the newspapers.
